channel.title: Hi, I'm Andy Johnson from HarpoonApp.com
channel.description:
Howdy! I'm Andy Johnson and I'm currently working on a product called [Harpoon][1] with my business partner Ryan Battles. Harpoon is a financial planning and metrics app aimed at freelancers.
For the past several years I've worked as a successful design consultant under the name of Shaping the Page. And although I've dabbled in several of my own small products to supplement my consulting income, Harpoon is my first serious attempt at a billion dollar, bootstrapped SaaS app. :)
I attended BaconBiz this year and see a lot of familiar faces here. Looking forward to learning from all of you, and hoping to contribute back as much as I can!
P.S. Ryan and I also run a meetup called [Bootstrap & Beer][6]. So if you're ever near Columbus, OH stop on by!
[1]: http://harpoonapp.com [2]: http://shapingthepage.com [3]: http://director-ee.com [4]: http://findbacon.com [5]: http://sharetheshelf.com [6]: http://bootstrapandbeer.org
